```
From: Jered Isaacman
Sent: Sunday, April 15, 2018 10:52 PM
To: [Redacted]
Subject:

I am going to share something completely absurd with you. I am sure at some
point you will hear it from others but want to share my perspective directly.
I think the world of the board members and the leadership team at Card Connect. I only
want good things for that company...
A few weeks ago, at the request of counsel, I sat with the Card Connect board in NYC.
[Redacted] were also in attendance. I spent hours with the board answering every question
imaginable going back to the beginning of time. The meeting went very well and lasted
pretty late into the evening.
Afterwards, I went to get a few drinks with [Redacted]
At the bar, I shared I was very upset about the Card Connect situation because i ultimately
felt it was going to end poorly for my brother. The Card Connect CFO was talking up my
brother which prompted me to ask what his background was. After a little research, I
found out he did not have the experience and the company was going to fail because of
it. I said the whole team will probably end up in jail. [Redacted] pushed back and I said I was
just repeating others concerns. We then started talking about another tech company that
was doing well but that was very overvalued and was a big ponzi scheme. A few other
companies came up that would face a similar fate.

I am very upset that this is going to end poorly for Card Connect. I answered every question
to be helpful during their investigation and was under the impression it was confidential
and would not be weaponized. I would be happy to answer any questions anytime to help.
```
